import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function RDSMonitor(){ const [instances, setInstances] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8080/rdsinstance?account_name=account1").then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) setInstances(res.data) }).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) }, []) return(

{instances.map(instance =>( ))}
Account Name DB Instance Name Maintenance Window Backup Window Automated Backups Storage Maximum Storage Threshold Multi Az
{instance.account_name} {instance.instance_class} {instance.maintenance_window} {instance.backup_window} {instance.automated_backups} {instance.storage} {instance.maximum_storage_threshold} {instance.multi_az}
) } export default RDSMonitor
